text: ondu dina nivu visvasi purusaru mattu visvasi striyarannu kanuviri; avara (visvasada) belaku avara mundeyu avara bala bhagadallu dhavisuttiruvudu. ‘‘Indu nimage, taladalli nadigalu hariyuttiruva svarga totagala subha varte ide’’ (endu avarodane helalaguvudu). Avugalalli avaru sadakala iruvaru. Iduve maha vijayavagide
